title: how 2 fix?

replies.body:
1. Get a bucket of water
2. Put tons of ice in it
3. Nominate 3 other computers.
4. ALS Ice Bucket Challenge: Computer Edition
5. Open Chrome
6. If all fails, try again.
replies.body_tagged:
1. Get a bucket of water
2. Put tons of ice in it
3. Nominate 3 other computers.
4. ALS Ice Bucket Challenge: Computer Edition
5. Open Chrome
6. If all fails, try again.

replies.body:
1. Slowly unplug your computer
2. Throw your router out the window
3. Throw your computer after it
4. Get new computer and router
5. Makes sure you didn't throw your monitor out the window

yh, wait until I get a new computer.
